name: TurretMaster
description: An invading army that does not stop. One survivor that can turn coffee creamer into a flame thrower and junk metal into shells. Defend the land against ground and air threats and move up the ranks. Become a creator with the level editor and challenge friends from all over the world with your own visions of an impossible invasion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 Storage: 350 MB available space
